OrgName.entry: WOODLAND TRUST, THE - WANTLEY DRAGON WOODS

Desc.entry: For a fee the Woodland Trust will dedicate trees in Wantley Dragon Woods, Oughtibridge. Created as part of the 'Woods on your Doorstep' millennium campaign, Wantley Dragon Woods was planted with 15,000 broadleaf trees and shrubs. Participants receive a card, certificate and map of the wood. Dedications start from Â£15.
